description: Berlin officially surrendered to Soviet forces on 2 May but fighting continued until the war ended.
title: VE Day: The fall of Nazi Berlin in pictures
title_page: VE Day: The fall of Nazi Berlin in pictures - BBC News
maintext: Civilians began to clear up the city, and the leaders of the US, UK and USSR all met in the Berlin suburb of Potsdam just months after the war ended to shape the peace.
